title: The owner will be entitled to avail the permissible BUA of Y % of reserved plot for other permissible uses in the zone under these Regulations on the remaining land [(100- ‘Y’) % of the land] as permitted under this regulations
clause_text: The owner will be entitled to avail the permissible BUA of Y % of reserved plot for other permissible uses in the zone under these Regulations on the remaining land [(100- ‘Y’) % of the land] as permitted under this regulations.
section: Conditions for Development of reserved land under Accommodation Reservation (AR)
